      • setLabel

        setLabel This method is used to set a label to an item.
        Parameters:

      • addItem

        public void addItem(goru.assign1.salebin.ItemType item)
        addItem
        Overrides:
        addItem in class Bin
        Parameters:
        item: - An itemType

        This method checks if the item's weight along with the smartBin's total weight is not exceeding maxWeight. If it doesn't exceed, we add the item to the smartBin. This method also calculates totalWeight of smartBin items while adding it to the array. When adding an item whose weight exceeds smartBin's total weight beyond maxWeight, it skips adding to the array and prints the item details. We check if the item is fragile and if fragile we set "Fragile - Handle with Care" as label for the item

      • calculatePrice

        public USMoney calculatePrice()
        calculatePrice

        This method calculates the total price of items in the smartBin. If the item is fragile, we add an additional $10 for each fragile item to total cost. A cost of $100 is added to the total cost of the smartBin items.

        Overrides:
        calculatePrice in class Bin
        Returns:
        Total price of the items.

      • showDetails

        public java.lang.String showDetails()
        showDetails

        This methods shows details of the Bin like Bin number, current weight and the total cost.

        Overrides:
        showDetails in class Bin
